ModMetaData.name: SolWorld – Automated Crypto Arena (10v10)
ModMetaData.author: SolWorld Team
ModMetaData.description:
Automated 10v10 arena battles with 5-minute cadence (30s preview + 4m combat).
Features: • No respawns - fight to the last pawn standing • Crypto payouts via external backend integration • Full arena reset after each round (corpses, items, terrain restored) • Live scoreboard with kills and team status • Token holder selection from Solana blockchain
Place an Arena Core and two Team Spawners to begin automated rounds. Configure backend API settings in mod options.
WARNING: This mod requires an external backend server for crypto integration.
